channel.title: [PI] Highscores help
channel.description:
Everything is done correctly saving 100% website is working and displaying, and no errors!
I need some help with character rights, if you're a c.playerRights = 3 it displays donor crown next to your name! If you need any files i'll give them to you :D And also how not to display owner's and admins on website! thanks :). thanks!
quick link - guide a followed = https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=364364.0

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:9, topic:522985”]i believe you have to add their names into the array. i havent worked with those highscores in about a year or two.

you could modify the code to use a table for rights, and just edit the sql.java to add their rights as well.[/quote]

Alright, I’ll try adding names to the array

edit: Worked, and thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

i believe you have to add their names into the array. i havent worked with those highscores in about a year or two.

you could modify the code to use a table for rights, and just edit the sql.java to add their rights as well.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:7, topic:522985”]functions.php method BBCode calls to see if the usernames are in the arrays

$webbers = array("N/a"); $admins = array("N/a"); $mods = array("N/a"); $high_mods = array("N/a"); $donators = array("N/a"); $banned = array("null", "", " ")
set up the images correctly to respond with the rights.[/quote]

Well, when mods are on the high scores list, i don’t see the crown next to them or anything, but how would i make it if(c.playerRights == 1) you get the mod image next to their name?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

functions.php method BBCode calls to see if the usernames are in the arrays

$webbers = array("N/a"); $admins = array("N/a"); $mods = array("N/a"); $high_mods = array("N/a"); $donators = array("N/a"); $banned = array("null", "", " ")
set up the images correctly to respond with the rights.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Joseph69:

This is most likely client sided, in client.java edit the crown image rights.

This has nothing to do with the client.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

This is most likely client sided, in client.java edit the crown image rights.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

this in function.php

function BBCode($playerName) { include "mysql.php"; if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $webbers)) { return $webbers_code.ucwords($playerName); } else if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $admins)) { return $admins_code.''.ucwords($playerName).'';; } else if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $high_mods)) { return $high_mods_code.ucwords($playerName); } else if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $mods)) { return $mods_code.ucwords($playerName); } else if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $donators)) { return $donators_code.''.ucwords($playerName).''; } else { return ucwords($playerName); } }
well that's the only thing with ranks in it, but tbh I don't see player rights?

And that’s in mysql.php

// ARRAY REMEMBER ALWAYS START WITH MALL LETTER $webbers = array("N/a"); $admins = array("N/a"); $mods = array("N/a"); $high_mods = array("N/a"); $donators = array("N/a"); $banned = array("null", "", " ");

// ICONS
$webbers_icon = “http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/3287/moddws8.gif”;
$admins_icon = “http://i7.tinypic.com/8foy68l.gif”;
$mods_icon = “http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/3287/moddws8.gif”;
$high_mods_icon = “http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/3287/moddws8.gif”;
$donators_icon = “http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/5434/donnf7.gif”;

// BBCODE
$webbers_code = ‘’;
$admins_code = ‘’;
$mods_code = ‘’;
$high_mods_code = ‘’;
$donators_code = ‘’;

p.s - was gone because i got ddosed for and hour and a half.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

the highscores, mysql.php is what determines the links.
the highscores, functions.php (methods BBCode($playerName)) is what draws it.

look into those methods

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, technically, this wouldn’t be server sided…

But what you ‘could’ do is add a new column to the table with player rights in it.
and have the server send the player rights data along with the stats, and have your php file check if player rights = X, show Y image.

Read full topic
